tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  server_id INT,
  log_message TEXT,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE system_performance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    server_id INT,
    cpu_usage DECIMAL(5,2),
    memory_usage DECIMAL(5,2),
    disk_usage DECIMAL(5,2),
    performance_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE server_performance_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    server_id INT,
    cpu_usage FLOAT,
    memory_usage FLOAT,
    disk_space FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE edge_server_logs (
  log_id INT,
  server_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  log_message VARCHAR,
  PRIMARY KEY (log_id)
)

CREATE TABLE server_metrics (
  metric_id INT,
  server_id INT,
  metric_type VARCHAR,
  metric_value FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (metric_id)
)

CREATE TABLE system_logs (
  log_id INT,
  system_name VARCHAR,
  log_level VARCHAR,
  log_message VARCHAR,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (log_id)
)

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
  metric_id INT,
  server_id INT,
  metric_type VARCHAR,
  metric_value FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (metric_id)
)

CREATE TABLE server_status (
  status_id INT,
  server_id INT,
  status_code INT,
  status_message VARCHAR,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (status_id)
)
